data.name: Student Aide - Mohammed Ajao #1 Create Yourself
data.description:
Object-oriented programming is based on the concept that data can be represented through classification. A dog can be a dog class or object. So can a bee, a computer, a planet, and humans.

Let's make a human into an object with the most basic features we have at least.

- The ability to greet others
- The ability to walk
- The ability to add numbers

```javascript
Human.getName() // Outputs the name of the Human
Human.greet("InsertNameHere"); // Outputs "Hello InsertNameHere"
Human.walk(5); // Outputs Human has walked 5 miles.
Human.add(3,5) // Outputs 8
Human.add(3,5,6,7) // Outputs 21
Human.add(1,2,3...) // Outputs the sum of all arguments
```
